1.Title: Super Scary Little Tiger
1.Description: Upon entering combat, Ju Fufu's CRIT Rate increases by 12%, and she immediately gains 100 <color=#FFFFFF>Might</color>. When Ju Fufu's <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> hits an enemy, when the target is Stunned, the target's Stun DMG Multiplier increases by 35%, lasting for 30s.
1.Lore:
"The topic of farewells and life and death is too difficult for children to understand, too heavy for adults to bear, and too cruel for the elderly."
"But I'm not afraid — I'm the fearless Tiger Thiren who learned this lesson early."
"I'm a super scary big tiger, little critters, so please don't look directly into my eyes!"

2.Title: Almighty Qingming Warrior
2.Description: While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Tiger's Roar</color> state, character CRIT DMG increases by an additional 22%. Whenever any character activates an <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, Ju Fufu gains 3 points of <color=#FFFFFF>Momentum</color>.
2.Lore:
"The techniques Shifu taught me are truly amazing, though it can't compare to those of fairy tales and legend."
"If I were a little stronger — just a little stronger — could I rewrite those fated pasts, like in the stories and legends?"
"At first, I was just as puzzled, but once you grasp the trick, it's actually quite simple! Let me teach you, {F#junior sister}{M#junior brother}!"

3.Title: Righteous Young Hero
3.Lore:
"Good or evil, in that moment, perhaps it's all just a matter of a single thought. A single thought leaves behind so many regrets, so many 'what ifs' — and so much sacrifice and love."
"I'm not smart, I don't understand many of those grand principles, so I just do what I think is right."
"Wherever the great hero Fufu goes, there's justice!"

4.Title: Monster-Slaying Tiger Mystic
4.Description: While Ju Fufu is in the <color=#FFFFFF>Tiger's Roar</color> state, her CRIT DMG increases by 35%.
4.Lore:
"Ethereals are terrifying, bandits are terrifying, Hollow Raiders are terrifying, the dark night without stars is terrifying — and yet, I'm the most powerful mystic of Yunkui Summit. I cannot retreat, I cannot let my story repeat."
"The dark and gloom is a blanketing shroud, unbearable for mountain, moon, and cloud."
"I am the strongest mystic of Yunkui Summit, evil spirits and demons, meet your end!"

5.Title: Unrivaled Almighty Senior
5.Lore:
"No need to fear — your senior is here!"
"The hero I longed for when I was a child never came, but I won't make you wait — I will be your hero."
"You can bully me, but not my juniors! I'll take you on! Rwaar!"

6.Title: Roar of My Inner Tiger
6.Description: Ju Fufu's <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> DMG increases by 30%. Upon consuming <color=#FFFFFF>Momentum</color> and hitting an enemy in the high-speed spinning state, fire 3 popcorns, each dealing 160% of Fufu's ATK as DMG. This DMG is treated as <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> DMG.
6.Lore:
"My might shakes the moon down from the mountain, my aura levels caves — how's this line? Does it capture the grandeur of my imposing presence?"
"The name of a hero doesn't matter, their regrets don't matter, their tears don't matter, and even the inevitable farewell doesn't matter."
"As long as you remember, I once roared with bravery."

DescriptionByLevel.1:
When Ju Fufu isn't using Hu Wei, it will automatically attack enemies and gain <color=#FFFFFF>Might</color> upon hitting them.
When Hu Wei hits an enemy and has at least 100 <color=#FFFFFF>Might</color>, and Ju Fufu is not the currently active character, Ju Fufu will launch <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack: Suppressing Tiger Cauldron</color> centered around the target enemy. Upon activation, all squad members gain the <color=#FFFFFF>Tiger's Roar</color> effect: CRIT DMG increases by <color=#2BAD00>10%</color>, and when Ju Fufu's initial ATK is greater than or equal to 2,800, every additional 100 ATK further increases CRIT DMG by 5%, up to a maximum additional increase of 30%.
While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Tiger's Roar</color> state, character <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>/<color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color> DMG increases by <color=#2BAD00>10%/20%</color>.
The <color=#FFFFFF>Tiger's Roar</color> state lasts for 30s. Repeated triggers reset the duration. While Ju Fufu is in the <color=#FFFFFF>Tiger's Roar</color> state, Impact increases by <color=#2BAD00>25</color>.
DescriptionByLevel.2:
When Ju Fufu has yet to use Hu Wei, it will automatically attack enemies and gain <color=#FFFFFF>Might</color> upon hitting them.
When Hu Wei hits an enemy and has at least 100 <color=#FFFFFF>Might</color>, and Ju Fufu is not the currently active character, Ju Fufu will launch <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack: Suppressing Tiger Cauldron</color> centered around the target enemy. Upon activation, all squad members gain the <color=#FFFFFF>Tiger's Roar</color> effect: CRIT DMG increases by <color=#2BAD00>11.7%</color>, and when Ju Fufu's initial ATK is greater than or equal to 2,800, every additional 100 ATK further increases CRIT DMG by 5%, up to a maximum additional increase of 30%.
While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Tiger's Roar</color> state, character <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>/<color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color> DMG increases by <color=#2BAD00>11.7%/23.3%</color>.
The <color=#FFFFFF>Tiger's Roar</color> state lasts for 30s. Repeated triggers reset the duration. While Ju Fufu is in the <color=#FFFFFF>Tiger's Roar</color> state, Impact increases by <color=#2BAD00>29.2</color>.

When Ju Fufu has yet to use Hu Wei, it will automatically attack enemies and gain <color=#FFFFFF>Might</color> upon hitting them.
When Hu Wei hits an enemy and has at least 100 <color=#FFFFFF>Might</color>, and Ju Fufu is not the currently active character, Ju Fufu will launch <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack: Suppressing Tiger Cauldron</color> centered around the target enemy. Upon activation, all squad members gain the <color=#FFFFFF>Tiger's Roar</color> effect: CRIT DMG increases by <color=#2BAD00>13.3%</color>, and when Ju Fufu's initial ATK is greater than or equal to 2,800, every additional 100 ATK further increases CRIT DMG by 5%, up to a maximum additional increase of 30%.
While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Tiger's Roar</color> state, character <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>/<color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color> DMG increases by <color=#2BAD00>13.3%/26.7%</color>.
The <color=#FFFFFF>Tiger's Roar</color> state lasts for 30s. Repeated triggers reset the duration. While Ju Fufu is in the <color=#FFFFFF>Tiger's Roar</color> state, Impact increases by <color=#2BAD00>33.3</color>.

Upon activation, all squad members gain the <color=#FFFFFF>Tiger's Roar</color> effect: CRIT DMG increases by <color=#2BAD00>15%</color>, and when Ju Fufu's initial ATK is greater than or equal to 2,800, every additional 100 ATK further increases CRIT DMG by 5%, up to a maximum additional increase of 30%.
While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Tiger's Roar</color> state, character <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>/<color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color> DMG increases by <color=#2BAD00>15%/30%</color>.
The <color=#FFFFFF>Tiger's Roar</color> state lasts for 30s. Repeated triggers reset the duration. While Ju Fufu is in the <color=#FFFFFF>Tiger's Roar</color> state, Impact increases by <color=#2BAD00>37.5</color>.

Upon activation, all squad members gain the <color=#FFFFFF>Tiger's Roar</color> effect: CRIT DMG increases by <color=#2BAD00>16.7%</color>, and when Ju Fufu's initial ATK is greater than or equal to 2,800, every additional 100 ATK further increases CRIT DMG by 5%, up to a maximum additional increase of 30%.
While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Tiger's Roar</color> state, character <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>/<color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color> DMG increases by <color=#2BAD00>16.7%/33.3%</color>.
The <color=#FFFFFF>Tiger's Roar</color> state lasts for 30s. Repeated triggers reset the duration. While Ju Fufu is in the <color=#FFFFFF>Tiger's Roar</color> state, Impact increases by <color=#2BAD00>41.7</color>.

When Hu Wei hits an enemy and has at least 100 <color=#FFFFFF>Might</color>, and Ju Fufu is not the currently active character, Ju Fufu will launch <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack: Suppressing Tiger Cauldron</color> centered around the target enemy. Upon activation, all squad members gain the <color=#FFFFFF>Tiger's Roar</color> effect: CRIT DMG increases by <color=#2BAD00>18.3%</color>, and when Ju Fufu's initial ATK is greater than or equal to 2,800, every additional 100 ATK further increases CRIT DMG by 5%, up to a maximum additional increase of 30%.
While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Tiger's Roar</color> state, character <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>/<color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color> DMG increases by <color=#2BAD00>18.3%/36.7%</color>.
The <color=#FFFFFF>Tiger's Roar</color> state lasts for 30s. Repeated triggers reset the duration. While Ju Fufu is in the <color=#FFFFFF>Tiger's Roar</color> state, Impact increases by <color=#2BAD00>45.8</color>.

Upon activation, all squad members gain the <color=#FFFFFF>Tiger's Roar</color> effect: CRIT DMG increases by <color=#2BAD00>20%</color>, and when Ju Fufu's initial ATK is greater than or equal to 2,800, every additional 100 ATK further increases CRIT DMG by 5%, up to a maximum additional increase of 30%.

MathSkill.Title: Additional Ability: Aura of Authority
MathSkill.Description:
When another character in your squad is an <color=#FFFFFF>Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Rupture</color> character:
The maximum Decibels for all characters in the squad increases by 1,000. When an <color=#FFFFFF>Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Rupture</color> character uses an <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, that character gains 300 Decibels.

139100001.Title: Basic Attack: Tiger Seven Forms - Flaming Claw
139100001.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Slash forward up to four times, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color> and <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
During the 3rd hit, repeatedly press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to maintain the combo and keep striking the enemy.
During the 3rd hit, hold or pause before pressing <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to chain into the 4th hit.
During the 3rd hit, Anti-Interrupt Level is increased, and DMG received is reduced by 40%.

139100002.Title: Basic Attack: Hu Wei
139100002.Description:
During combat, Hu Wei will automatically attack enemies, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Upon hitting an enemy, gain 20 points of <color=#FFFFFF>Might</color>, triggering up to once per use of a skill. The maximum for <color=#FFFFFF>Might</color> is 200.

139100016.Title: Basic Attack: Tiger Seven Forms - Flaming Claw

139100003.Title: Special Attack: Tiger Seven Forms - Mountain-Descending Tiger
139100003.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Perform a spinning slash forward, followed by a falling slash, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

139100004.Title: EX Special Attack: Tiger Seven Forms Alt - Mountain-Descending Savage Tiger
139100004.Description:
With enough Energy, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Swing <color=#FFFFFF>Hu Wei</color> forward for a powerful strike, dealing massive <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Upon activation, gain 3 points of <color=#FFFFFF>Momentum</color> and 80 points of <color=#FFFFFF>Might</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

139100028.Title: Special Attack: Tiger Seven Forms - Mountain-Descending Tiger

139100031.Title: EX Special Attack: Tiger Seven Forms Alt - Mountain-Descending Savage Tiger

139100005.Title: Dodge: Tiger Seven Forms - Tigerwind
139100005.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

139100006.Title: Dash Attack: Tiger Seven Forms - Tiger Charge
139100006.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a dodge to activate:
Perform a quick slash forward, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

139100007.Title: Dash Attack: Tiger Seven Forms - Mountain King's Game
139100007.Description:
After using <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Tiger Seven Forms - Tiger Charge</color>, hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Enter a high-speed spinning state. While in this state, use the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} to move and deal <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color> upon contact with enemies.
After Ju Fufu gains <color=#FFFFFF>Momentum</color> from other skills, she will be surrounded by flames in the high-speed spinning state. Upon contact with enemies, 1 point of <color=#FFFFFF>Momentum</color> is consumed, changing the DMG to <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color> and granting 25 points of <color=#FFFFFF>Might</color>. The maximum for <color=#FFFFFF>Momentum</color> is 15.
When dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>, if <color=#FFFFFF>Might</color> is above 100 points, 100 points of <color=#FFFFFF>Might</color> will be automatically consumed to trigger <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack: Suppressing Tiger Cauldron</color>.
Releasing <IconMap:Icon_Normal> will have Ju Fufu exit the spinning state and throw <color=#FFFFFF>Hu Wei</color> to attack enemies. When switching to another character, Ju Fufu will remain in the spinning state and attempt to collide with the nearest enemy.
While Ju Fufu is the currently active character, DMG taken during the skill is reduced by 40%, and Anti-Interrupt Level is increased. If not the active character, she becomes Invulnerable.

139100008.Title: Dodge Counter: Tiger Seven Forms - Reignited Mountain
139100008.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:
Perform multiple slashes on enemies ahead, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

139100035.Title: Dash Attack: Tiger Seven Forms - Tiger Charge

139100038.Title: Dash Attack: Tiger Seven Forms - Mountain King's Game

139100041.Title: Dash Attack: Tiger Seven Forms - Mountain King's Game - Momentum

139100044.Title: Dodge Counter: Tiger Seven Forms - Reignited Mountain

139100009.Title: Chain Attack: Tiger Cauldron Collapse
139100009.Description:
When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:
Swing Hu Wei to deliver a powerful strike to enemies in a small area ahead, dealing massive <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

139100010.Title: Chain Attack: Suppressing Tiger Cauldron
139100010.Description:
With at least 100 points of <color=#FFFFFF>Might</color>, after triggering a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, automatically activate:
Consume 100 <color=#FFFFFF>Might</color> to open Hu Wei and fire flames and popcorn at enemies, striking them in a small area ahead, dealing massive <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
If <color=#FFFFFF>Momentum</color> is available, and while not the active character, <color=#FFFFFF>Fiery Spin</color> will activate after the skill ends.
This is an <color=#FFFFFF>Aftershock</color>. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

139100011.Title: Ultimate: Tiger Seven Forms - Raging Tiger Explosion
139100011.Description:
When Decibel Rating is at <color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Perform two downward attacks with Hu Wei, dealing massive <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Upon activation, gain 6 points of <color=#FFFFFF>Momentum</color> and 100 points of <color=#FFFFFF>Might</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

139100053.Title: Ultimate: Tiger Seven Forms - Raging Tiger Explosion

139100013.Title: Quick Assist: Decisive Stomp
139100013.Description:
When the active character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Slashes enemies in front, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

139100014.Title: Defensive Assist: Steadfast Crouching Tiger
139100014.Description:
When the on-field character is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

139100015.Title: Assist Follow-Up: Feral Blazing Maw
139100015.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> after a <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color> to activate:
Slash forward at enemies, then use <color=#FFFFFF>Hu Wei</color> to follow up with a downward attack, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Gain 1 point of <color=#FFFFFF>Momentum</color> upon activation at most once every 10s.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
